body.name: AvaJex Travel Toiletry Bag for Men and Women - Large Hanging Organizer - Waterproof Hygiene Bag with Metal XXL Swivel Hook, YKK Zippers and 19 Compartments for Toiletries, Makeup, Cosmetics
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 12 mins
features: 🏆 INVEST IN THE TOP QUALITY YOU DESERVE: The reinforced double-stitched handle, extra durable zippers and the sturdy metal swivel hook make this hanging travel organizer uniquely long-lasting. 19 compartments with useful dividers and elastic loops will neatly store all your personal toiletry essentials, without taking up too much space in your luggage!

☔ VERSATILE TRAVEL BAG FOR TOILETRIES: Compact, lightweight and made of premium polyester with no smell,and an easy to clean lining, this large toiletry bag is a keeper! Plus, it will save you the mess of spilled liquids on your clothes in your luggage, thanks to its 100% waterproof inner lining! guaranteed.
🎁 OFFER IT AS AN UNFORGETTABLE 🎁! Large enough to fit full-sized bottles of hairspray, toothbrushes, shampoo, shaving tools and makeup accessories, this travel toiletry bag makes the best 🎁!
👍 EVERYTHING IS EASY TO SEE & FIND: This luxurious toiletry wash bag for women & men will make transporting your toiletry essentials more comfortable - and a bit more stylish!
✔️ MULTIFUNCTION: This travel organizer kit cannot only be used as a toiletry bag, but also as a bathroom shower bag or cosmetic case for your makeup tools, shampoo, soaps, and shaving essentials.
✈️ TRAVEL BAG: The compact but spacious size of the bag (12.2” x 10.6’) is perfect for a piece of hand luggage on any flight, business trip.

What are the dimensions of the toiletry bag? The dimensions of the toiletry bag are 10.6 inches (27 cm) in length, 12.2 inches (31 cm) in width, and 3.2 inches (8 cm) in height. Does the toiletry bag have waterproof compartments? Yes, the toiletry bag has waterproof compartments that are designed to protect your toiletries from spills and leaks. It also made from water-resistant material so you can easily use it in bathroom. Can the toiletry bag accommodate both travel-sized and full-sized bottles? Yes, the toiletry bag is designed to fit both travel-sized and full-sized bottles, providing flexibility in packing your toiletries. What special feature does the toiletry bag have? The toiletry bag features a spinning metal hook, allowing you to conveniently hang it on a variety of surfaces & it is equipped with double zippers, making it easy to access the compartments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just What I Needed !
reviews.reviewText: The time came when I had to move my recently widowed 94-year-old Mom into an assisted living facility, which is a 7-hour road trip away from where I reside, which means I'll be calling a hotel my home whenever I visit her - SO - I needed to find a new "portable toiletry cabinet" for these trips, because the one I usually use for pleasure travel/vacations is smaller and just won't get the job done in this situation . . . so I spent a good amount of time on Amazon researching their huge selection of toiletry bags, and am VERY GLAD I found this excellent one !...it's VERY well-designed and VERY WELL MADE, with quality fabric and zippers, a great rotating hanging hook which makes where it gets hung much easier, and SOOOO much room for everything I was hoping to bring with me & then some !...the three elastic-topped mesh pockets in the back of the main compartment are very helpful because they act as a kind of "back-up" that the (larger) items I put in front of them lean against them and stand up straight & don't fall over...and the front zippered mesh pocket is nice and flexible, even a bit "stretchy", so it holds more than I thought it would (yay !) - so yes, I did find the "portable toiletry cabinet" I was looking for, thanks to this winner . . . Thank You, AVAJEX ! ! !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I cant give a good opium on this product yet. As this is for Xmas presents, but it seems to be good quality. A lot of pockets. Seems to be well seemed. You can feel that it is waterproof. I have packed this full for granddaughter and son for Xmass. For when they travel. Its a nice size compares the ones I checked. Thats important when you travel. I like that it has a lot of the elastic thingy things to put your bottles in. Good size pockets also. The stich on the hook seems to be very good quality. For sure that is a must have. Been hanging on chair for a month now and dont seem to have problems getting in and out of it, as per zippers, etc. With out any damage. Would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling or gym!
reviews.reviewText: I got this primarily for traveling- it has so many compartments and works great for holding travel-sized containers of shampoo, conditioner, lotion, etc. but it also has loops for makeup brushes, a razor, etc. and some more discreet pockets for things like tampons. Highly recommend. Very sturdy zipper and one of the little clear compartment bags that attaches with snaps comes off - perfect size to bring on a plane with some carry-on sized lotions, etc. and then you can snap it back on when you get there if you want. Hangs on any door or bar so you can easily just hang it in the bathroom and not have to store it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Durable and Holds a Lot
reviews.reviewText: It isnwhat it is .... I like this bag , it holds a lot and is well constructed. Inlike that you can hang it up; it just makes it easier to access. One thing I would like would be more enclosed compartments to hold liquids. They are nice to have in a bag like this should something leak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding in every regard!
reviews.reviewText: The travel bags were a gift and I couldn't be more pleased. The stitching/craftsmanship is excellent; the many compartments enable complete organization, protect the stored items, and the netting allows total visibility of the items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: The size is great I wanted a big bag to carry my personals for my business trip but not bulky and this was it lots of compartments and I love the hanger so I don't have to put it on the floor I can just hang it on the back of the door. Good quality as well it will definitely last me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is traveling over seas this summer and wanted this for Christmas. As she said, there’s ever enough room on hotel bathroom vanities so this will be great for holing all her toiletries and keep them organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little on the Big side...
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the vaJex Travel Toiletry Bag, and overall, I found it to be a decent toiletry organizer for both men and women. The bag's design is simple and practical, with enough space to accommodate all my essential toiletries during my travels. While it didn't blow me away, it served its purpose effectively.One of the standout features of this bag is its large size, allowing me to pack everything I needed without feeling cramped. The multiple compartments and pockets were well-designed, providing ample space for different items such as toothbrushes, razors, skincare products, and more. It was particularly helpful to have a dedicated section for liquids, ensuring no accidental spills occurred and preventing any potential mess inside my luggage.On the downside, I would have appreciated a bit more structural support for the bag. While it did have a hook for hanging, the lack of reinforced walls made it a little flimsy, especially when fully loaded. Additionally, the absence of any additional features or compartments for smaller items like earrings or hairpins was a missed opportunity for better organization. I use this for the GYM and it may be a little big for the GYM.
man some hotels are so dirty bro if you got one of these youre escaping those hostel shower floors forever and its compact and can fit on any door, keep yourself clean

al llegar, solo lo abro y cuelgo, no batallo con mis cosas personales, compacto pero le cabe de todo, viajo bastante seguido y aun en casa lo uso, ya que solo lo cierro y me llevo todo lo de uso personal conmigo, desodorantes, crema, perfume, rastrillos, todo!

reviews.reviewTitle: El tamaño es ideal para viajar
reviews.reviewText: Esta bien diseñado , cierres o sipers se atoran un poco al principio, pero en general la relacion calidad/precio es adecuada
